name: Sazakan
description: The Sazakan embodies the essence of cold and ice, featuring a frosty appearance that evokes a wintry landscape.
memorable: It can alter weather conditions and has an imposing Wintry Aura that damages nearby creatures.
goals: To control the battlefield through cold manipulation and impair its foes.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures, particularly those associated with ice and cold.
environment: Typically found in frigid locations where cold weather prevails.
strengths: Immunity to exhaustion and paralysis; highly capable of manipulating its environment.
weaknesses: Limited by its inability to change wind conditions, dependent on the surrounding environment for its full power.
attacks: The Sazakan can attack with its Icy Wind Lash, dealing both slashing and cold damage, while using its Ice Whirlwind for area control.
most_powerful_ability: Its Blizzard Heart allows it to change weather conditions, mimicking spell effects without the need for action.
senses: It possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and an impressive passive perception of 17, allowing it to be highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: It is proficient in perception, making it very good at noticing its environment.
additional_information: Has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Immunities to conditions like exhaustion, paralysis, and petrification.
Can create a frost vortex with Ice Whirlwind that affects multiple creatures.
The Wintry Aura deals cold damage to all nearby enemies at the start of its turn.
Requires only half the air, food, and drink of a humanoid of its size.
test_queries: frozen creature causing icy wind damage
medium ice creature with blizzard powers
